power_plants.name: power_plants
power_plants.description: Contains information about power plants and their characteristics

tables.name: power_plants_data
tables.description: Contains information about power plants and their characteristics

columns.name: Plant_Code
columns.description: Unique code assigned to each power plant

columns.name: Utility_Name
columns.description: Name of the utility company operating the plant

columns.name: City
columns.description: City where the plant is located

columns.name: County
columns.description: County where the plant is located

columns.name: State_Name
columns.description: State where the plant is located

columns.name: Primary_Source
columns.description: Primary energy source used by the plant

columns.name: Data_Miner_Report_Link
columns.description: Link to the data miner report

overburdened_communities.name: overburdened_communities
overburdened_communities.description: Contains demographic information for block groups including poverty, minority, and language proficiency data

tables.name: census_data
tables.description: Contains demographic information for block groups including poverty, minority, and language proficiency data

columns.name: Population_Under_2Times_Poverty
columns.description: Population in households under 2 times poverty level

columns.name: Total_Population
columns.description: Total population in the block group

columns.name: Population_Not_Hispanic_Latino
columns.description: Population not identifying as Hispanic or Latino

columns.name: Percent_Limited_English
columns.description: Percentage of households with limited English proficiency

columns.name: Block_Group_Tribal
columns.description: Tribal information for the block group

columns.name: Block_Group_County_Subdivision
columns.description: County subdivision of the block group

columns.name: Split_Block_Group
columns.description: Indicator if the block group is split

columns.name: Split_Municipality
columns.description: Indicator if the municipality is split

precipitation.name: precipitation
precipitation.description: Contains monthly and annual precipitation data from 1895 to 2024

tables.name: precipitation_data
tables.description: Contains monthly and annual precipitation data from 1895 to 2024

telecom_data.name: telecom_data
telecom_data.description: Database containing customer service and technical support information

techorder.name: techorder
techorder.description: Contains information about technical orders submitted to the company

columns.name: Tech_Order
columns.description: Unique identifier for the technical order

columns.name: Enter_Date
columns.description: Date when the order was entered into the system

columns.name: Completion_Date
columns.description: Date when the order was completed

columns.name: Truck_Roll
columns.description: Indicates if a technician was dispatched (true) or not (false)

columns.name: Resolved_Or_Postponed
columns.description: Y if resolved, N if postponed

columns.name: Technician_Name
columns.description: Name of the technician assigned to the order

columns.name: Tech_Location
columns.description: Location or area of the technician

agents.name: agents
agents.description: Contains information about customer service agents

columns.name: Start_Date
columns.description: Date when the agent started working

columns.name: End_Date
columns.description: Date when the agent stopped working (if applicable)

columns.name: Tech_Order_Flag
columns.description: Y if the call resulted in a tech order, N otherwise

facttable.name: facttable
facttable.description: Contains facts about customer calls and related information

columns.name: AgentKey
columns.description: Identifier for the agent who handled the call

columns.name: OrgKMASK
columns.description: Organization key (purpose unclear from provided information)

columns.name: Call_Duration
columns.description: Duration of the call in minutes

columns.name: Talk_Time
columns.description: Talk time during the call in minutes

columns.name: Hold_Time
columns.description: Hold time during the call in minutes

columns.name: Customer_Location
columns.description: Location of the customer affected by the outage

columns.name: Informed_By_Mail_SMS
columns.description: Whether the customer was informed by mail or SMS

columns.name: First_Informed_Date
columns.description: Date when the customer was first informed

columns.name: Second_Informed_Date
columns.description: Date when the customer was informed for the second time

columns.name: Account_Number
columns.description: Unique identifier for the customer account

columns.name: Start_Date
columns.description: Date when the account was created

columns.name: End_Date
columns.description: Date when the account was closed (if applicable)

columns.name: Self_Service_Installs
columns.description: Whether the customer has self-service installations

columns.name: Tech_Order
columns.description: Tech order associated with the account

columns.name: Internet_Service
columns.description: Whether the customer has internet service

columns.name: Port_IN_Cable
columns.description: Whether the customer has ported in cable service

columns.name: Streaming
columns.description: Whether the customer has streaming service

columns.name: Mobile
columns.description: Whether the customer has mobile service

columns.name: Port_In_Mobile
columns.description: Whether the customer has ported in mobile service

columns.name: Land_Line
columns.description: Whether the customer has land line service
